sources.title: The Diary of Anne Frank (TV-1967) DIANA DAVILAüçï MAX VON SYDOW
sources.description:
It's Friday @PizzaFLIX  
Writers: Anne Frank (book), Frances Goodrich & Albert Hackett (screenplay)
Stars: Max von Sydow, Lilli Palmer, Diana Davila
Directed by: Alex Segal
Just weeks after her 13th birthday, Anne Frank and her family are forced into hiding during WWII in Nazi-occupied Holland. This is her story.

TRIVIA: Published posthumously in 1947, ‚ÄúA Diary of a Young Girl‚Äù was first adapted into a Pulitzer Prize-winning play by Frances Goodrich and Albert Hackett in 1955. Their screenplay has been adapted multiple times including the 1959 Oscar-winning movie, and this 1967 Teleplay introducing Diana Davila as Anne Frank.
